description.name: daibep20
description.tagline: Dai Token bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-dai Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Dai Token bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/dai receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/dai wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
